title: really why is ranked full of scripters and riot isnt doing a thing about
body: just played with 2 on the same team, [REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] and [REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] were both legit scripting, im playing lux and multiple times legit multiple times my q went right through them and they were immune to snares, why id none of this being looked into seriously there cheaters, and no one cares,

replies.body:
1. Riot cracked down on scripters a long time ago and its nearly impossible to script now without your account getting insta perm banned or the script even working. I know because my friend used to script.
2. Are you sure they just didn't have a spell shield? lol.

It's also worth noting that scripts don't make abilities go through you, rather they let you dodge them with machine precision. This sounds more like latency or camera angles to me but without more info that's a guess at best.
Oh yeah didnt even think of that, scripts dont make abilities go through your character xd

i play xerath and the amount of times i get called a scripter has gone down since i got to plat but in bronze to gold if i had a good game some1 would call scripting. personally i think watching youtube streamers clickbait lies has negatively affected very susceptible people

look up scripts in league on youtube to have a better idea on what scripting looks like in league and did u ever consider that your teammates were hitting their skillshots and it was you that was just not hitting them?

Why is everything you post about how others are scripting? Why do you assume Riot isn't getting rid of them, when clearly if they weren't, everyone would be doing it? When will you learn that posting names will get removed?
